DataElement.preferredDefinition: The location of the skin from which the specimen was collected.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages._Relating to anatomy._A position within another named site.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.

Property.preferredDefinition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.:Relating to anatomy.:A position within another named site.

Concepts.definition: An organ that constitutes the external surface of the body. It consists of the epidermis, dermis, and skin appendages.
Relating to anatomy.
A position within another named site.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Right; being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.: One of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the east when facing north.
The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.: One of the two lower extremities in humans used for locomotion and support.

Concepts.definition: Being or located on or directed toward the side of the body to the west when facing north.
The portion of the lower extremity between the knee and the ankle. For clinical purposes this term is also used to refer to the whole inferior limb.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::1: A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.: In a place or position that is lower.: The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.
In a place or position that is lower.
The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

PermissibleValues.value: 2 cm below patella on medial side
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: 2 Centimeter Below Patella on Medial Side

ValueMeaning.preferredName: 2 Centimeter Below Patella on Medial Side
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::2: A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.: In a place or position that is lower.: A small flat triangular bone in front of the knee that articulates with the femur and protects the knee joint.: Toward the middle or inside (as opposed to lateral).: One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A basic unit of length in the former CGS version of metric system, equal to one hundredth of a meter or approximately 0.393 700 787 inch.
In a place or position that is lower.
A small flat triangular bone in front of the knee that articulates with the femur and protects the knee joint.
Toward the middle or inside (as opposed to lateral).
One of the two lateral margins or surfaces of a body, midway between the front and back.
